cards.rules_text:
Whenever Jorah, the High and Holy enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {V} [i](an influence counter).[/i]
Creatures you don't control with power less than or equal to your influence can't attack or block.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast Unholy Spirit, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each other creature card in all graveyards. If {B} was spent to cast Unholy Spirit, that creature assimilates all creatures cards in all graveyards.

Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, you may reveal a card from your hand that shares a type with that spell and cast it without paying its mana cost.

Flash
When Æthereal Elemental enters the battlefield, change the target of target spell that targets only a single creature to Æthereal Elemental.
When Æthereal Elemental dies, draw two cards, then discards two cards.

Flying, menace
When Crippling Abnormality enters the battlefield, target opponent controls you during your next turn. [i](That player sees all cards you could see and makes all decisions for you.)[/i][i][/i]

Haste
{1{B}G}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with base power equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's base power, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
God's Ruinous Wake deals 10 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. Lands you don't control don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The town of Trivanna found its own path into the light. This did not please Jorah.[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Ancient Gharial can't be countered.
When Ancient Gharial enters the battlefield, scry 3.
When Ancient Gharial leaves the battlefield, shuffle it into its owner's library.

{4}, {T}: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card with converted mana cost less than or equal to your influence, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your hand and you get {V} [i](an influence counter)[/i].

Any number of target players each draw a card.
Cirno, Sly Arcanist deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in their hand.
You get an emblem with “Whenever an opponent would draw a card outside of his or her draw step, instead you draw a card and this emblem deals 3 damage to that player.”

cards.special_text:

[-1]: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. You gain that much life.
